name: MazEscape (Global Divine Games)
description:
Finding your way out of a path, could be sometimes easy, sometimes difficult, sometimes lucky, something confusing, sometimes frustrating and sometimes feel's good.

Testing your thinking ability, your memory or ability to know the previous path you have followed (When you lose a level) in other to perform better the next time. It is a very good brain training.

Running inside a maze with a limited time to come out is very good, and here the GLOBAL DIVINE GAMES bring to you MazEscape.

                                                            Teenage Programmers.
